column5: Spacious and modern two story home with stunning Texas hill country views.   This house is ideal for up to 8 people with 4 bedrooms and 3 baths, or couples/families looking for an incredible get-away. It's quiet and serene, perched on a 2 acre hilltop. Relax by the outdoor fire pit or in the jacuzzi, both with panorama hill country views and unforgettable sunsets. The house is minutes from several great restaurants, vineyards, entertainment and shopping. Downtown Austin is just 30 minutes away.
